name: The Fastest Trigger In The West
name_original: The Fastest Trigger In The West
description:
The Fastest Trigger In The West, is a game where you are a sheriff and have to fight against the bad guys, reflecting their bullets and shooting them.

We made this game for LudumDare 34, we hope you enjoy it!!!

The Team:

Igor de Souza (Game Designer and Artist) - folz.igor@gmail.com / @Igor_Folz

Lucas Dias (3D Artist and Animator) - djinf15@gmail.com

Jessé Santana (Lead Programmer) - jessesantana92@gmail.com

Gustavo Fráguas (Programmer) - gustavofraguas@gmail.com
